articles.author: Jeramie Bizzle, Darius Johnson, Todd Feurer
articles.title: Richard Allen convicted in Delphi murder trial for killings of 2 teenage girls in Indiana - CBS Chicago
articles.description: Richard Allen convicted in Delphi murder trial for killings of 2 teenage girls in Indiana
articles.content:
CHICAGO (CBS) — After more than three days of deliberations, an Indiana jury has convicted Richard Allen in the murders of two teenage girls who had vanished during a hike in Delphi in 2017.
